entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -28.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
